item.title: 彭博社政府记者乔-梅耶斯（Joe Mayes）告诉《城市》杂志，如果保守党想要赢得大选，本周的预算案必须成为 "杀手时刻"。
item.description:
This week’s budget has to be a “killer moment” if the Conservatives want a chance at winning the election, Bloomberg government reporter Joe Mayes tells In the City https://t.co/gDmmCIlBLy

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024

item.title: 一组经济学家认为，瑞士应抓住瑞士央行行长托马斯-乔丹离任的机会，对央行进行改革
item.description:

item.title: 市场参与者一直专注于判断美联储何时以及在多大程度上放缓资产负债表的松绑，却没有考虑到另一个问题
item.description:
Market participants have been so focused on determining when and how much the Fed will slow its balance-sheet unwind that they haven’t considered another wrinkle https://t.co/VzDwvo0ZEv

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024

item.title: D.E. Shaw 是购买银行为减轻监管负担而出售的所谓盲池风险敞口的对冲基金之一

item.title: 反对党候选人科希特尔-加尔韦斯（Xochitl Galvez）表示，她正在考虑恢复墨西哥城的一个国际机场项目，该项目已被现任总统取消。
item.description:
Opposition candidate Xochitl Galvez says she’s considering reviving an international airport project in Mexico City that was scrapped by the current president https://t.co/MCPzEUcMmL

item.title: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）财富管理业务首席信息官表示，中国股市的大幅下跌还不足以成为将资金投入中国的理由
item.description:
China’s big stock-market declines aren’t enough to warrant putting money in the country, according to the CIO of Goldman Sachs' wealth-management business https://t.co/8tqwf8BxZW

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024

item.title: 美国最大的加密货币交易所 Coinbase 表示，在不到一周的时间里，一些个人投资者的账户余额第二次为零。
item.description:
Coinbase, the biggest US cryptocurrency exchange, said some individual investors saw zero balances in their accounts for the second time in less than a week. https://t.co/0Blcj8HBMw

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024

item.title: 石油资源丰富的委内瑞拉和圭亚那之间的边界争端出现了新的变化，圭亚那连续第三个月的石油出口量超过了邻国。
item.description:
The border dispute between oil-rich Venezuela and Guyana got a new twist with Guyana exporting more oil than its neighbor for the third straight month. https://t.co/3Y1a6dbfSd

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024

item.title: 穆巴达拉集团（Mubadala）正盯上那些在巴西难以实现盈利的国际食品特许经营企业，以提升其在拉丁美洲最大经济体的影响力。
item.description:
Mubadala is eyeing popular international food franchises that are struggling to turn a profit in Brazil as it seeks to boost its presence in Latin America’s largest economy https://t.co/1ZiTtapyQ1

item.title: Mercury 13 是一家以女子足球俱乐部为目标的投资集团，已达成第一笔交易，购买了意大利北部科莫女子足球俱乐部的控股权。
item.description:
Mercury 13, an investment group targeting women’s football clubs, has reached its first deal, purchasing a controlling stake in FC Como Women in northern Italy. https://t.co/6bvtj3MSTB

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024

item.title: 由法国雅高集团支持的奢华生活方式酒店公司霍克斯顿酒店（Hoxton Hotels）的所有者恩尼斯摩尔公司（Ennismore）正在寻求融资，以扩大在美国的业务。
item.description:
Hoxton Hotels owner Ennismore, the luxury lifestyle hotel company backed by France’s Accor, is seeking to raise capital for expansion in the US https://t.co/KGnG7M7Yyd

item.title: 一个农场组织警告说，摩洛哥将需要增加小麦进口，因为又一场干旱即将来临
item.description:
Morocco will need to boost wheat imports as yet another drought looms, a farm-lobby group warns https://t.co/UjZatU5TMH

item.title: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的财富管理部门正在为其客户提供一个机会，让他们在私人公司向更广泛的公众开放之前，就能购买和出售梦寐以求的股份。
item.description:
Morgan Stanley’s wealth management arm is giving its clients a chance to buy and sell coveted shares of private companies before they are available to the wider public, as startups weighing IPOs increasingly remain private for longer. https://t.co/dLpDmT8yUK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024

item.title: 必和必拓公司首席商务官表示，该公司希望在预计于 2026 年开始生产的价值 140 亿美元的大型钾肥项目之外，扩大其在加拿大的业务。
item.description:
BHP hopes to expand its presence in Canada beyond a massive $14 billion potash project expected to start producing in 2026, according to the company’s chief commercial officer. https://t.co/A1UAsQw7Et

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024

item.title: 朱庇特资产管理公司（Jupiter Asset Management）计划通过在交易前购买美元来应对美国股票结算速度加快的问题，这是全球资金管理公司为限制交易失败风险而不得不做出改变的一个例子。
item.description:
Jupiter Asset Management plans to cope with faster US equity settlement by purchasing dollars in advance of trades, an example of the changes global money managers are having to make to limit the risk of failed transactions. https://t.co/uBEWqFOSTx

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024

item.title: 瑞士政府认为无法阻止瑞士电信收购沃达丰意大利业务的计划
item.description:
Switzerland’s government sees no scope to block Swisscom’s plans to buy Vodafone’s Italian business https://t.co/ns8bQXCpdh

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024

item.title: 亚特兰大联储主席拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）表示，他预计首次降息（他预计在第三季度进行）之后将暂停降息
item.description:
Atlanta Fed President Raphael Bostic said he expects the first interest-rate cut, which he has penciled in for the third quarter, will be followed by a pause https://t.co/1kLF3arE9U

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024

item.title: 本周英国将公布财政预算案，财政大臣杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）将在保守党后座议员和债券市场之间左右为难。此外，制造商能否通过减少巧克力生产来战胜可可通胀？与 @AllegraStratton 一起了解详情
item.description:
With the UK Budget this week, Chancellor Jeremy Hunt is caught between Conservative backbenchers and the bond markets. Plus, can manufacturers beat cocoa inflation by cutting back on chocolate? Get The Readout with @AllegraStratton https://t.co/BYTpfJylmE

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024

item.title: 伊朗不顾美国制裁，液化石油气出口激增，因为美国的压力未能阻止伊斯兰共和国的能源销售
item.description:
Iran is defying US sanctions with surging exports of liquefied petroleum gas, as American pressure fails to dent the Islamic Republic’s energy sales https://t.co/IydtIq4vIN

item.title: 有迹象表明，华盛顿准备加大力度将中国电动汽车拒之于美国市场之外，中国指责美国参与保护主义。
item.description:
China charged the US with engaging in protectionism amid signs that Washington is prepared to step up efforts to keep Chinese EVs from the American market https://t.co/QFfkYKAbe6

item.title: 说起高薪的科技公司首席执行官，雪花公司的弗兰克-斯鲁特曼（Frank Slootman）并不是人们首先想到的名字。
